skillTree.localised_description: This Boss is especially sneaky, able to deploy deep in enemy gits' terrain before battle.
Like all nasty skulkers, dis Boss is "a bad piece o' work" – when he stabs he really means it.
If Night Goblins know one thing, it's that victory is victory, no matter; in fact, the sneakier the better.

related_phases.onscreen_name:
Skarsnik's Death Juice!
	Damage over time

skillTree.localised_description: A Squig is an unconventional mount, but survivors say it has a certain charm.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Squig units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Squig units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Night Goblins are vicious little beasts with addled-brains and despicable little plans.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +6 for Goblin and Night Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20% for Night Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.
You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: "It ain't really hidin, jus tac-tik-kel moving is all!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: When push comes to shove, make sure you aren't the one being pushed!

effects.description: Steal +25% of the experience earned by other Lords

Unlocks Hero recruitment: Goblin Big Boss
	(all provinces)

Unlocks Hero recruitment: Night Goblin Shaman
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: "Take it, take it all! Every las' bit of it!"

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: Skarsnik has a unique history with working in the dark, and his expertise in the matters of ambush and betrayal are legendary!

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +6 during ambushes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Orc choppas are crude and hefty blades usually swung with violent joy by their owner. A choppa in full swing can have a brutal, crunching impact on the poor fool on the receiving end.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Orcs may be stronger, but Goblins are smarter, nastier, and better-er.

skillTree.localised_description: Greenskin cavalry can be devastating if the myriad mounts can behave. Getting a big stick and maybe a "carrot" in the form of an orange-painted gobbo is the answer!

skillTree.localised_description: The sneakiest and stabbiest gobboes are just as dangerous as the largest, fiercest Orcs.

skillTree.localised_description: It’s one fing to be big, but quite anuva to be strong as well!

skillTree.localised_description: Nuffin' smashes harder than a rock fallin' from da sky, except mebbe da Bad Moon, if it were to fall.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
Every cave and ditch is a hiding place for these Goblins - you cannot hit what you cannot see.
Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +4%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +8%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +12%

skillTree.localised_description: Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +5% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Night Goblins are sneaky and pervasive - they creep and crawl from every hole to join in the killin'.
They march because they're told to, and of course because they'll get a 'right proper thrashin'' if they don't.
Occasionally an Orc will come along who is more "kunning" than the rest. He quickly rises in ranks as his plans end in victory.
A Boss that has the loyalty of the mobs means he doesn’t have to worry so much about "da boring stuff" like tents and bedding, as they’ll fight for him no matter what.
Being green meanz ya really mean.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

factionEffects.localised_description: Skarsnik is a meddlesome and cunning Night Goblin, preferring to taunt and torment his opponents rather than swiftly killing them. Ever the sneakiest of his kind, he leads his forces on feints and duplicitous manoeuvres that leave his enemies bewildered, beleaguered, and - eventually - destroyed.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -40% for Goblin and Night Goblin units
Upkeep: -25% for Goblin and Night Goblin units
Can only recruit Orc units from Karak Eight Peaks
Upkeep and recruitment cost: -25% for Goblin units

Waaagh! has a chance to contain Doom Divers
	(all armies)
Unique building chain available at Karak Eight Peaks

Recruit rank: +1 for Goblin and Night Goblin units
	(all armies)

items.colour_text: Skarsnik's pointed staff, pulsating with magical energy, channels the might of Gork (or Mork) to lance out with weird, terrifying power.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

items.colour_text: When the leering yellow face of the Bad Moon Banner rises, all Night Goblins swell with an insane blend of daring and battle-madness!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: “The Peaks belong to me. I dare yoo to try and take ‘em from me, stunty.”

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

Charge bonus: +14 for Night Goblin Squig Hoppers units
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
